comments.body: Your code now indicates that the module supports check-mode, but you are not defining the $check_mode variable, and are not doing anything to support check-mode in your code. So this is worse, because people will expect that in check-mode no real changes are being made, but instead changes will be made !

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +22,26 @@# win_route (Add or remove a network static route)

$params = Parse-Args $args -supports_check_mode $true

$check_mode = Get-AnsibleParam -obj $params -name "_ansible_check_mode" -default $false
